Name: ConfigurationChange
Description: View changes to in-guest configuration data such as Files Software Registry Keys Windows Services and Linux Daemons

Properties.Name: ConfigChangeType
Properties.Description: Type of configuration item that changed: Files Software WindowsServices Registry Daemons

Properties.Name: ChangeCategory
Properties.Description: The type of change that occurred: Added Removed Modified

Properties.Name: SoftwareType
Properties.Description: Type of the software: Application Package Update

Properties.Name: SoftwareName
Properties.Description: Name of the software

Properties.Name: Previous
Properties.Description: Previous value

Properties.Name: Current
Properties.Description: Current value

Properties.Name: Publisher
Properties.Description: Software publisher name

Properties.Name: SoftwareDescription
Properties.Description: Description of the software

Properties.Name: SvcChangeType
Properties.Description: Service property that was changed

Properties.Name: SvcDisplayName
Properties.Description: Human-frinedly name for the service

Properties.Name: SvcName
Properties.Description: Name of the service

Properties.Name: SvcState
Properties.Description: Current state of the service

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousState
Properties.Description: Previous state of the service

Properties.Name: SvcStartupType
Properties.Description: Startup behavior of the service

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousStartupType
Properties.Description: Previous startup behavior of the service

Properties.Name: SvcAccount
Properties.Description: User account that is associated with the service executable explicitly to provide a security context for the service

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousAccount
Properties.Description: Previous user account that was associated with the sevice executable

Properties.Name: SvcRunlevels
Properties.Description: Modes used by the daemon for system operation

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousRunlevels
Properties.Description: Previous modes used by the daemon for system operation

Properties.Name: SvcController
Properties.Description: Parent process for the daemon

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousController
Properties.Description: Previous parent process for the daemon

Properties.Name: SvcPath
Properties.Description: The file path to the executable for the service

Properties.Name: SvcPreviousPath
Properties.Description: Previous file path to the executable for the service

Properties.Name: LastSnapshotAge
Properties.Description: Age of the last snapshot

Properties.Name: RegistryKey
Properties.Description: Registry key name

Properties.Name: Hive
Properties.Description: Registry hive for the changed registry key

Properties.Name: ValueName
Properties.Description: Name of the value for the registry key being tracked

Properties.Name: ValueData
Properties.Description: Data contained in the value and registry key being tracked

Properties.Name: PreviousValueData
Properties.Description: Previous registry value data

Properties.Name: ValueType
Properties.Description: Type of the value for the registry key being tracked

Properties.Name: PreviousValueType
Properties.Description: Previous registry value type

Properties.Name: FileSystemPath
Properties.Description: File system path for the changed file

Properties.Name: Size
Properties.Description: Current size of the changed file

Properties.Name: PreviousSize
Properties.Description: Previous file size

Properties.Name: DateCreated
Properties.Description: Date that the item was created

Properties.Name: PreviousDateCreated
Properties.Description: Previous date created time

Properties.Name: DateModified
Properties.Description: Date that the item was last modified

Properties.Name: PreviousDateModified
Properties.Description: Previous date modified time

Properties.Name: PreviousAttributes
Properties.Description: Previous attributes value

Properties.Name: Acls
Properties.Description: The Access-Control List specifies which users or system processes are granted access to objects

Properties.Name: PreviousAcls
Properties.Description: Previous Acl value

Properties.Name: FieldsChanged
Properties.Description: Fields that were changed as part of the change record

Properties.Name: FileContentBlobLink
Properties.Description: Blob link for tracked file content

Properties.Name: PreviousFileContentBlobLink
Properties.Description: Previous file content blob link value

Properties.Name: FileContentChecksum
Properties.Description: Checksum of the file content

Properties.Name: PreviousFileContentChecksum
Properties.Description: Previous file content checksum value

Properties.Name: MG
Properties.Description: Id of the management group for System Center Operations Manager agents.

Properties.Name: ManagementGroupName
Properties.Description: Name of a resource's assigned management group

Properties.Name: TenantId
Properties.Description: ID of the worksapce that stores this record

Properties.Name: TimeGenerated
Properties.Description: Date and time the record was created.
